f g x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | mplsubg.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |

| 5 |  | mplsubg.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` R ) = ( 0g ` R ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 9 |  | #P_0fin | |- (/) e. Fin |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> (/) e. Fin ) |
| 11 |  | #P_unfi | |- ( ( x e. Fin /\ y e. Fin ) -> ( x u. y ) e. Fin ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. Fin /\ y e. Fin ) ) -> ( x u. y ) e. Fin ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ssfi | |- ( ( x e. Fin /\ y C_ x ) -> y e. Fin ) |

| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_mplsubglem2 | |- ( ph -> U = { g e. ( Base ` S ) | ( g supp ( 0g ` R ) ) e. Fin } ) |
| 16 | 1, 6, 7, 8, 4, 10, 12, 14, 15, 5 | #P_mplsubglem | |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` S ) ) |
